description.value:
Activation: 0

The best battle is one you don’t have to fight. If your calm appeals meet willing hearts, you’d rather end the conflict peacefully.

In combat, if all non-minion enemies are currently pacified (such as by @UUID[Compendium.cosmere-rpg.heroic-paths.Item.ObDHVO8mAqRCbvya]{Calm Appeal}) and all other non-minion characters agree to cease hostilities, you can ease tensions. The combat immediately ends and becomes a conversation.

At the GM’s discretion, you can use this talent in non-combat scenes.
